column4: hi all. I have a question. Have been using Kubuntu instead of mswindows for nearly a year. two days ago tried to install mandriva on a spare drive. it threw an error installing. now my kubuntu wont load. grub works, kubuntu screen loads then "loading essential drivers = ok", but then hangs permanently at "mountng root file system". If I hit esc key at grub prompt first the last couple lines of out put = "run-init: /sbin/init: error 8" t
looks like you've formatted your root fs
well, I guess you can just reinstall ubuntu
